meanings.definition: A class of arthropods comprising spiders, scorpions, mites, and ticks.
meanings.sent1: Arachnids like spiders and scorpions have eight legs.
meanings.sent2: I saw some arachnids crawling on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The arachnids were having a dance party in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The web of arachnids trapped their prey like a skilled hunter.
meanings.sent5: The arachnids in the forest seemed to be watching me with their many eyes.

meanings.definition: Any member of the class Arachnida.
meanings.sent1: An arachnids' body is divided into two segments.
meanings.sent2: The arachnids in this exhibit are fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent3: The arachnids decided to throw a birthday party for the spider.
meanings.sent4: Her fear of arachnids was like a dark cloud hanging over her.
meanings.sent5: The arachnids scurried away as soon as I approached, showing their shyness.
